short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for supporting Korean and Japanese fonts to Excalidraw

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The font used in the Excalidraw web service does not support Korean and Japanese fonts. When writing in Korean or Japanese, the text does not harmonize well and feels foreign. Installing the Tiramisu extension enables support for Korean and Japanese handwriting fonts, allowing you to use the Excalidraw service with a more beautiful and clean screen.
